content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = '[GoogleAdsCampaign]' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = '[0002]')
CREATE TABLE [0002].[GoogleAdsCampaign]
	(
	 [Date] date,
	 [Campaign State] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Campaign Type] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Impressions] bigint,
	 [Clicks] bigint,
	 [Campaign Name] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Taxonomy Check] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Business Unit] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Spend EUR] bigint,
	 [Platform Name] bigint,
	 [Unique ID] bigint,
	 [PSCID] bigint,
	 [Platform PSCID] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 HEAP
	 -- CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_[GoogleAdsCampaign]
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO [0002].[GoogleAdsCampaign]
(Date 1, [Campaign State] 2, [Campaign Type] 3, Impressions 4, Clicks 5, [Campaign Name] 6, [Taxonomy Check] 7, [Business Unit] 8, [Spend EUR] 9, [Platform Name] 10, [Unique ID] 11, PSCID 12, [Platform PSCID] 13)
FROM 'https://adlsdatax01.dfs.core.windows.net/dataxsynapsefs/0002/0002.GoogleAdsCampaign.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,DATEFORMAT = 'dmy'
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://adlsdatax01.dfs.core.windows.net/dataxsynapsefs/0002/'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [0002].[GoogleAdsCampaign]
GO
